expo.name: Corona Check

infoPlist.NSLocationWhenInUseUsageDescription: Allow use of your location to track community COVID-19 spread.
infoPlist.NSLocationAlwaysAndWhenInUseUsageDescrip: Allow use of your location to track community COVID-19 spread.
infoPlist.NSLocationAlwaysUsageDescription: Allow use of your location to track community COVID-19 spread.

expo.description: A contact tracking app which builds a memory of proximity contacts and immediately notifies contacts of positive cases can achieve epidemic control if used by enough people
